alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Jackson, east central Walton, Washington, northeastern Decatur, Miller, southern Mitchell, southwestern Baker and Seminole Counties through 800 PM EDT/700 PM CDT/... At 730 PM EDT/630 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Newton to near Colquitt to 10 miles southeast of De Funiak Springs. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Vernon, Newton, Chipley, Donalsonville, Marianna, Camilla, Eglin Air Force Base, Bradford, Live Oak, Malone, Cottondale, Greenwood, Ponce De Leon, Alford, Wausau, Iron City, Brinson, Bascom and Whitehead Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
